channel.title: Nutmeg high?
channel.description: Has anyone ever gotten high off of nutmeg?

item.title: Nutmeg high?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:43, topic:241730”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=318091.msg2527432#msg2527432 date=1226264713]

[quote author=Uriko link=topic=318091.msg2527413#msg2527413 date=1226264081]

no it doesn’t

Fuck…

it does work, though the high is shit,
i used to do it when i was 12 when you didnt know who to ask for bud.

The only problem here, is the fact that I’m broke x)

EDIT: The banana skins, should they be mixed with tobacco?
I’m so gonna try this.

If it’s a fail, we’ll leave it to that.
If it’s a win, I’ll start doing it more often

My next weeks experiment ^^

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bananadine

ya just bill the spliff as you normally would, use grinder on your dried skins, leave the skins for a long time tho

just dry the skins in the microwave. This won’t affect the potency, as bannadine is not microwave soluble. then grind up the dried peels really well, and soak them in methylene chloride (zippo lighter fluid makes a good substitute). soak for 2 days, and then rinse well with ether. Discard the liquid and save the mush, then take the mush and soak it in ethyl alcohol for another 2 days. filter, and put the mush aside - you won’t be smoking it.

Thats a lot of work though lol, just go find someone to sell it (don’t buy it off the streets) and buy some shit or go in your medicine cabinet.

Sounds like alot of work, but I might try it out. But I’m not sure
[/quote]Are you fucking retarded or what? Did you even read the Wikipedia link he posted?

[quote]Bananadine is a fictional psychoactive substance which is allegedly extracted from banana peels.
Bananadine is a fictional psychoactive substance which is allegedly extracted from banana peels.
Bananadine is a fictional psychoactive substance which is allegedly extracted from banana peels.
Bananadine is a fictional psychoactive substance which is allegedly extracted from banana peels.[/quote]

If you belive wikipedia to the maximum level, your the one retarded.

Also, I said I might try it out. Even if it works or don’t work.
[/quote]I never implied that, that and a SIMPLE Google search justified it enough, if you’re too fucking lazy to research something and believe what idiots say on the internet, go ahead… But you shouldn’t be calling ME retarded for that.

Go ahead and try it, you’ll just make yourself sick if anything.[/quote]
Thank you for letting me control my own life.

Read full topic

item.title: Nutmeg high?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“army_life, post:26, topic:241730”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=318091.msg2525912#msg2525912 date=1226200659]

no it doesn’t

Fuck…

it does work, though the high is shit,
i used to do it when i was 12 when you didnt know who to ask for bud.

The only problem here, is the fact that I’m broke x)

EDIT: The banana skins, should they be mixed with tobacco?
I’m so gonna try this.

If it’s a fail, we’ll leave it to that.
If it’s a win, I’ll start doing it more often

My next weeks experiment ^^

en.wikipedia.org

Bananadine

Bananadine is a fictional psychoactive substance which is supposedly extracted from banana peels. A hoax recipe for its "extraction" from banana peel was originally published in the Berkeley Barb in March 1967. Just a few months earlier, Donovan's hit single "Mellow Yellow" (1966) had been released, and in the popular culture of the era, the song was assumed to be about smoking banana peels. In August 6, 1967, shortly after the song's release, bananadine was featured in a New York Times Magazin...

ya just bill the spliff as you normally would, use grinder on your dried skins, leave the skins for a long time tho

just dry the skins in the microwave. This won’t affect the potency, as bannadine is not microwave soluble. then grind up the dried peels really well, and soak them in methylene chloride (zippo lighter fluid makes a good substitute). soak for 2 days, and then rinse well with ether. Discard the liquid and save the mush, then take the mush and soak it in ethyl alcohol for another 2 days. filter, and put the mush aside - you won’t be smoking it.
[/quote]

Thats a lot of work though lol, just go find someone to sell it (don’t buy it off the streets) and buy some shit or go in your medicine cabinet.[/quote]
Sounds like alot of work, but I might try it out. But I’m not sure

Read full topic

If it’s a fail, we’ll leave it to that.
If it’s a win, I’ll start doing it more often

My next weeks experiment ^^
[/quote]

en.wikipedia.org

Bananadine

Bananadine is a fictional psychoactive substance which is supposedly extracted from banana peels. A hoax recipe for its "extraction" from banana peel was originally published in the Berkeley Barb in March 1967. Just a few months earlier, Donovan's hit single "Mellow Yellow" (1966) had been released, and in the popular culture of the era, the song was assumed to be about smoking banana peels. In August 6, 1967, shortly after the song's release, bananadine was featured in a New York Times Magazin...

ya just bill the spliff as you normally would, use grinder on your dried skins, leave the skins for a long time tho

just dry the skins in the microwave. This won’t affect the potency, as bannadine is not microwave soluble. then grind up the dried peels really well, and soak them in methylene chloride (zippo lighter fluid makes a good substitute). soak for 2 days, and then rinse well with ether. Discard the liquid and save the mush, then take the mush and soak it in ethyl alcohol for another 2 days. filter, and put the mush aside - you won’t be smoking it.[/quote]

Thats a lot of work though lol, just go find someone to sell it (don’t buy it off the streets) and buy some shit or go in your medicine cabinet.

Read full topic

just dry the skins in the microwave. This won’t affect the potency, as bannadine is not microwave soluble. then grind up the dried peels really well, and soak them in methylene chloride (zippo lighter fluid makes a good substitute). soak for 2 days, and then rinse well with ether.
